summary: Changes the amount of gold received from Gold Coin Purses.
descriptionHtml:
------------------------------
GOLD COIN PURSE REDO
------------------------------
This mod changes the amount of gold the player receives from each Gold Coin Purse (Small, Medium, and Large). Version 1 includes random additional \"change\" amounts of gold on top of the flat amount, the same as Vanilla. Version 2 does not.

------------
\"CHANGE\"
------------
In Vanilla Skyrim, Gold Coin Purses actually contain 3 items. Flat Gold, and two different types of \"change\" amounts of gold. One type has a 90% chance of getting a bonus amount of gold (1-9), and the other has a 25% chance of getting a bonus amount of gold (1-9). All purse sizes contain the same amount (1) of 25% chances, but the 10% chances vary. Small Purses have 1 10%, Mediums have 2, and Larges have 3. 

---------------------------
VANILLA GOLD PURSES
---------------------------
FLAT + RANDOMS
---------------------------
SMALL : 5 + RANDOMS
MEDIUM : 10 + RANDOMS
LARGE : 20 + RANDOMS
----------------------------

------------------------------
VERSION 1 GOLD PURSES
-----------------------------------
INCREASED FLAT + RANDOMS
-----------------------------------
SMALL : 10 + RANDOMS
MEDIUM : 25 + RANDOMS
LARGE : 50 + RANDOMS
---------------------------

------------------------------
VERSION 2 GOLD PURSES
--------------------------------------
INCREASED FLAT. NO RANDOM.
--------------------------------------
SMALL : 25
MEDIUM : 50
LARGE : 100
-----------

Thank you to everyone who made this mod possible : Myself. Also thanks to Ka3m0n, who supported this mods development.
author: FuqDup
